title: Dollar Store Roy Orbison
description:
Will Smith storms the stage and slaps Chris Rock after Rock makes a joke about Jada Pinkett Smith (00:00:10). Ethan from Aquaboggan let's us in on the plans for the Saco Drive-In (00:42:50). Kevin From Bristol's appearance on Montante's World compares his voice to Roy Orbison & details why Kirk doesn't bring him in-studio (00:58:40). Chris with his best game yet & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
